message: Hi Bob, I'd like to propose a fair 50/50 split of the $10000. Agreeing now prevents any discounting on my side and simplifies things for both of us. Looking forward to your response!
Alice, considering the inflation affecting me, I propose a 55/45 split in my favor. This way, we both still get a fair share while accounting for the economic conditions on my side.

Hi Bob, I appreciate you accounting for the current economic conditions. Although a slight reduction on my side isn’t ideal, I understand the discounting effect that comes with each round. Considering that further rounds would devalue my share even more, I think it’s best to close the deal now. I accept your offer.
